Name: Lychee Martini
Ingredients: 1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
6 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: As the name promises, lychee fruitiness shines throughout this dry (fruity but not sweet) Martini.
History: Recipe by yours truly in May 2025.
Nutrition: One serving of Lychee Martini contains 154 calories
